s.text: Sure, I may have written most of it, but Paige was the reason why it was fully completed, and why itÕs sitting in store windows.
Before I knew it, we had written a book.
I began writing about when Paige came into my life, and she helped, writing down her own memories.
I began writing about when Paige came into my life, and she helped, writing down her own memories.
Then write your entry using those tags somewhere in the story.
The Challenge is to write a sequel to another writers ficlet.
